oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ||kunnu who possessed locusts and rain, and was entreated for rain by a relative of the narrator. (L VIII.-7. 6639 rev. -6646 rev.). 1) See also The death of |kannu the rain's man who was ||kabbo's 'person' (pp.2264opp. & 2264v), 2) This story is found in Book VIII-7.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: |kannu the rainmaker
